project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a CSV file and performs basic data analysis by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Create a function to read the CSV file and store the data
Implement a function to calculate the mean of specified columns
Implement a function to calculate the median of specified columns
Implement a function to calculate the mode of specified columns
Add a user interface for inputting the column names and displaying results
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure correctness
